title: Pork conference targets small-scale pig farmers (Virginia Tech - Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University) ...
text: ( Source : Virginia Tech - Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University ) BLACKSBURG, Va., Oct. 14 , 2015 - Virginia Cooperative Extension will host a small-scale and niche market pork production conference Nov. 6-7 at the Tidewater
